contact.title: Got curious?

content: mapset is the online editor for the simple creation of clear and visually appealing plan graphics.
The base map is optimised for public transport and contains all relevant information.

Design informative plans of stops quickly and easily. Substitute traffic or road works can be mapped as well as the situation during major events for which the guidance of passengers is required. In just a few minutes, a plan can be created that provides targeted information and has a high graphic quality.
If desired, the elements of the company's own corporate design can be adopted.

list.content: Add local information based on existing detailed maps. You can display routes, add pictograms to stops and stops edges or highlight points of interest.
list.title: Simple drawing of local information

list.content: The maps represent a standard in public transport and have a correspondingly high recognition value. The basemap not only ensures a graphically attractive presentation but is also automatically updated on a weekly basis. Alternatively, aerial photos can be selected as background. The basemap can be adapted to your needs by switching different layers on and off.
list.title: Attractive basemaps

list.content: The map base integrated into mapset is optimised for public transport and contains information on both rail and road traffic. In addition to stops, stop edges and station labels, this also includes tracks, bus routes and specially marked buildings at stations. In addition, points of interest such as combined mobility offers or other services can be displayed.
list.title: Relevant map data

list.content: The integrated geo-routing for pedestrians, buses and other means of transport offers ingenious support when drawing lines. By specifying the start and end points, the connecting lines are drawn automatically.
list.title: Routing

list.content: Download your own plans as image files and integrate them into your individual templates. The images can also be optimally used for integration in vehicle monitors. To optimise the export, you can specify the section and resolution for printing. You can also store your own print templates.
list.title: Print and export functions

list.content: Your plans can not only be exported as static images, but can also be dynamically integrated or linked in web pages or on interactive stelae. With dynamic integration, you can benefit from freely navigable maps on which users can determine the section and scale themselves. You can also send links to your individual plans by e-mail or share them via your social media channels.
list.title: Dynamic integration into digital channels

list.content: Creating simple plans for many stops is very quick with mapset: Simply enter the stop number and a standard plan is created. Optionally, templates can be defined for stops which are used when the plan is called up automatically. The default plans can be edited by all mapset users in your company.
list.title: Default plans

features.title: Bringing Clarity and Style to Public Transport Plans

main.content: With mapset you can create situation plans for public transport quickly and easily.
main.title: Do it yourself plans

metadata.description: You would like to provide your customers with up-to-date and attractive information about public transport? mapset is the online editor for fast and easy creation of clear and visually appealing station maps and plans for customer orientation.
metadata.title: mapset - Location plans for public transport

pricing.content: Here you can find the overview of mapset's annual costs and one-time setup fee for transportation companies. If you represent a different type of company, please contact us for an individual offer. If you are interested in additional services, we will also be happy to provide you with an individual package offer.
pricing.details_one: Prices refer to the total number of stops of a company, independent of the number of stops actually processed with mapset.

details_two.ch:
In addition to the ongoing subscription fees, a setup fee of CHF 490.- is charged at the start of the subscription. After a subscription interruption, the setup fee is due again when the subscription is renewed. For transport companies with up to 10 stops only the set-up fee is charged.

Within the scope of the subscriptions and the setup fee the configuration of users of mapset is included, provided the users can be identified via a uniform mail domain (e.g. james.meyer@ktuxy.com and :james.meyer@ktuxy.com). For the configuration of individual users, who are not identifiable via a domain, CHF 90.- per user will be charged.
details_two.io:
In addition to the ongoing subscription fees, a setup fee of € 490.- is charged at the start of the subscription. After a subscription interruption, the setup fee is due again when the subscription is renewed. For transport companies with up to 10 stops only the set-up fee is charged.

Within the scope of the subscriptions and the setup fee the configuration of users of mapset is included, provided the users can be identified via a uniform mail domain (e.g. james.meyer@ktuxy.com and :james.meyer@ktuxy.com). For the configuration of individual users, who are not identifiable via a domain, € 90.- per user will be charged.

pricing.title: Plans For Transport Companies Of Any Size

customers.name: Miro Bertozzi
customers.testimonial: We like working with mapset because individualizing plans is possible without additional graphics programs. The tool helps us to ensure consistent communication. We are very satisfied.

testimonials.title: Who is using mapset and why?
